glosses: The name of a Turkish village in Rize, Turkey, before the name was changed to a name of Turkish origin. (this name is used among the people now) (see also Azaklıhoca)

etymology:
From Ottoman Turkish سيقريق (sıkrık).
May be related to Kipchak [script needed] (sıkrık, “whistle, whistling”). There is no any other option to compare it. Whistle village is also possible village name but not obvious.
